q: Smith said a third bill by Rep. Mike Pence , R-Ind., would add to the limitations on federal funding for abortions by cutting off federal money from going to Planned Parenthood. Smith called the health care group the largest abortion network in the world, performing 324,000 abortions each year and deriving up to$ 1 billion each year from fees for services paid by federal, local and state governments.
